STRAIT OF SICILY.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 20 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
BETWEEN KELIBIA (36-51N 011-06E) AND
PANTELLERIA (36-50N 011-57E). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
